Software Engineering Manager and individual contributor who loves working in Ruby and JavaScript.

About

I’m a manager and individual contributor with over 8 years professional experience creating, maintaining, and supporting web apps and services with JavaScript and Ruby. Focused on delivering well-tested, quality code while fostering a culture of trust in cross-functional and product-driven agile teams. See my resumè.

Career

  • October 2020 - Present

    Senior Software Engineering Manager

    Managed a team of up to 9 frontend and fullstack software engineers across 3 teams

    Key project: Planned, contributed to, and led cross-team redesign of the critical workflows of the application which moved a significant portion of the app from Backbone to React, created new React components in our library, and increase application design consistency

  • June 2019 - October 2020

    Software Engineering Manager

    Managed a team of up to 6 engineers to successfully complete a variety of projects

    Key project: Lead development of Google Vault integration through partnership with Google which saves users time by providing the ability to import data directly from Google Cloud. Key project: Overhauled existing Legal Hold functionality by adding features, improving usability, and modernized frontend of that product by moving from Backbone to React

  • August 2018 - June 2019

    Senior Software Engineer

    Key project: Developed and deployed proof of concept through to production for new Serverless event-driven service to track data usage later used in invoicing

  • May 2016 - August 2018

    Team Lead - Software Engineer

    Managed a team of up to 7 engineers while owning up to 13 applications/services

    Key project: Designed a new service with my team which eliminated deployment dependencies

  • May 2013 - May 2016

    Software Engineer

    Contributed code to Rails applications, services, and libraries for green-field platform

    Key project: Created standard service client gem which was used as the core for future Ruby service clients

  • October 2011 - May 2013

    Student Software Developer

    Contributed code for web applications used by the university, mainly in Java. Graduated in May 2013.
